press_lid_v2.description: Trigger the dispenser by pressing the lid.

clean_and_press_lid.description: Clean the pressing_lid and then press it.

press_lid.description: Press the lid of the dispenser to release soap.

clean_lid.description: Clean the pressing lid of the dispenser.

clean_body_v2.description: Maintain hygiene by cleaning the body of the dispenser.

clean_dispenser_body.description: Clean the body of the dispenser to maintain hygiene.

overall_dispenser_operations.description: Clean the entire dispenser, then press the lid to trigger it.

clean_whole_dispenser.description: Clean the entire dispenser including the body and pressing lid.
